name: Miranda Gough
roleDescription: One of the lead organisers of the first ever LeedsHack last year, this year overseeing the event to support and guide the organising team in their roles.

name: Eschal Najmi
roleDescription: One of the lead organisers of the first ever LeedsHack last year, this year overseeing the event to support and guide the organising team in their roles. Also responsible for LeedsHack finances.

name: Paige Uppal
roleDescription: One of the lead organisers of the first ever LeedsHack last year, this year overseeing the event to support and guide the organising team in their roles.

name: Kai Ling Hoo
roleDescription: Oversees all branding and creative assets such as promotional materials, social media posts, and merchandise.

name: Josh Mundray
roleDescription: Co-ordinates ticketing, health and safety, venue, catering, and equipment for the event.

name: Naomi Josebashvili
roleDescription: Ensures the event is accessible, engaging, and a positive experience for all participants through running challenges, workshops, and welfare activities.

name: Anthony O'Brien
roleDescription: Responsible for securing sponsorships for the event and managing relationships with sponsor representatives.

name: Nalani Swan
roleDescription: Maintains the society's social media presence across Instagram and WhatsApp to update members on events, news, and opportunities.

name: George Hester
roleDescription: Works on the general development of the Leeds Computing Society website and controls development aspects of the online presence.
